api/JeremyAnsel.DirectX.D3DXof.XofFileFo.keywords: Enum XofFileFormats This flag is used to specify what file type to use when saving to disk. _BINARY, and _TEXT are mutually exclusive, while _COMPRESSED is an optional setting that works with all file types.
